messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Conference Excitement
messages.msgSnippet: Maybe this thought will help: To have a great party, all you have to do is get the people there....then they ll do the rest! Kristen ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Maybe this thought will help:

To have a great party, all you have to do is get the people there....then they'll do the rest!

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: KathrynJB@...
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 15, 2004 3:38 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Conference Excitement


In a message dated 8/15/2004 10:54:57 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
**Seriously, is anyone else just getting sooooo excited?**

Excited and nervous, all at once! :-)
*************************

It's starting to feel like I'm throwing this big party and people are
planning to come and it's all on me if it's a dud.

Please be gentle.
Kathryn


Kathryn Baptista, Conference Coordinator

Come to the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference August 27-29 in Peabody, MA!
For more information, go to www.LiveandLearnConference.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Conference Excitement
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/15/2004 5:44:24 PM Central Standard Time, KathrynJB@aol.com writes: It s  starting to feel like I m throwing this big party and people are
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/15/2004 5:44:24 PM Central Standard Time,
KathrynJB@... writes:

It's starting to feel like I'm throwing this big party and people are
planning to come and it's all on me if it's a dud.

Please be gentle.
Kathryn



~~~

Oh, Kathryn. It won't matter if the sound system doesn't work right or the
a/c is too cold (or whatever else you're worrying about). The energy flowing
back and forth and all around us will *be* the conference. You're just
providing a handy-dandy excuse for us all to get together. I can see how
organized you are and how well planned it is all the way from here. It will be
fine. Don't sweat the small stuff. Unschoolers can make their own fun.

Karen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
